TopicTitle: Boeing 747 - 176 kerbal capacity - By Zokesia Skunkworks!

Articles.Content:
![ayqxoJE.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ayqxoJE.jpg)

**Boeing 747**

**Designer: Zekes**

**Status:****COMPLETED**

**Cost:** **$656,461.00** 

A large airliner, with 176 kerbal capacity. Very slow to respond to controls. Press "4" to toggle flaps (although they're not really needed) and press "U" to toggle passenger lights, "G" for gear.

Max Speed is 300 m/s, **Max Altitude 15000m. If it explodes on launch, revert flight - no idea why it does this. Do not physical time warp while in flight EVER.**

***Download:*** [https://www./?zr05c6y93iexra1](https://www./?zr05c6y93iexra1)
Nice! I particularly like the engine pods. The wings give me OCD though..

> 
> Nice! I particularly like the engine pods. The wings give me OCD though..

I know, those things were NOT fun. if you'd like to try your hand at them, be my guest....

> 
> WOW
> thats low for you

It's twice that of a MiG-31, and even that was high in my opinion... I mean for an airplane at least.

Holy----That is mind-blowing! The sheer size..

Repped!

EDIT: Oh god, it has less parts than my Boeing 747 SCA, and is waaaaaaaay larger..

Hmmm, looks rather messy and needs some tonings and trimmings... The wings are a nightmare really xD in terms of construction ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
for when you need to kill a lot of Kerbals all at once. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I'm not always impressed by what people post in this forum, but when I am, it's by craft like that.

Well done.
